movement.Name: Blood-Soaked Jade
movement.Base Effect: Up to 8% increased damage at full life (min 4% at low life), +10% Movement Speed
movement.Rank 10 Effect: Increases all damage you deal by up to 32% and your Movement Speed by 20%. The damage bonus decreases as your Life decreases, but the minimum bonus is 16%. Additionally, your attacks heal you for 2% of damage dealt while the bonus is active.

movement.Name: Lightning Core
movement.Base Effect: Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning
movement.Rank 10 Effect: Your Primary Attacks and movement slowly charge you with electricity. When fully charged, your next Primary Attack will release chain lightning, dealing 180% base damage + 1,800 to nearby enemies. Additionally, you gain a 12% increased chance to critically strike while fully charged.

movement.Name: Bottled Hope
movement.Base Effect: Using a buff increases target's damage and movement speed by 8% for 6s
movement.Rank 10 Effect: Using skills to grant buffs increases damage done and Movement Speed of the target by 12% for 8 seconds. Additionally, the duration of all buffs on you is increased by 4 seconds.

movement.Name: The Abiding Curse
movement.Base Effect: 15% chance to curse enemies, reducing Attack and Movement Speeds by 35% for 2.50 seconds
movement.Rank 10 Effect: Your attacks have a 30% chance to curse enemies, reducing their Attack and Movement Speeds by 50% for 4 seconds. Additionally, cursed enemies take 12% increased damage from all sources.

movement.Name: Grim Rhythm
movement.Base Effect: Dealing damage increases your Attack Speed by 0.8% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. While at full stacks, your Movement Speed is increased by 9%.
movement.Rank 10 Effect: Dealing damage increases your Attack Speed by 2.4% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. While at full stacks, your Movement Speed is increased by 12%.

movement.Name: The Abiding Curse
movement.Base Effect: 15% chance to curse enemies, reducing Attack and Movement Speeds by 35% for 2.50 seconds

primary attack.Name: Ca'arsen's Invigoration
primary attack.Rank 10 Effect: Increases the speed of your Primary Attack by 16% and the damage of your Primary Attack by 2%.

primary attack.Base Effect: Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning
primary attack.Rank 10 Effect: Your Primary Attacks and movement slowly charge you with electricity. Additionally, you gain a 12% increased chance to critically strike while fully charged.

primary attack.Name: Mocking Laughter
primary attack.Base Effect: Primary Attack forces non-Elite monsters to attack you for 2.00 seconds
primary attack.Rank 10 Effect: Your Primary Attack forces non-Elite monsters it hits to attack you for 2 seconds. Additionally, you take 2% reduced damage from monsters affected by Mocking Laughter.

primary attack.Name: Power & Command
primary attack.Base Effect: Alternates states every 9s: Power increases Primary Attack damage by 8.00%, Command increases skill damage by 8.00%
primary attack.Rank 10 Effect: Alternates states every 9 seconds. Power increases your Primary Attack damage by 16%. Command increases all other skill damage by 16%. Additionally, you gain 6% increased Movement Speed while either state is active.

primary attack.Name: Lightning Core
primary attack.Base Effect: Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning

primary attack.Name: Howler's Call
primary attack.Base Effect: 10% chance on Primary Attack to summon spirit wolf dealing 150% base damage + 1,458
primary attack.Rank 10 Effect: Primary Attacks have a 20% chance to summon a spirit wolf that deals 240% base damage to all enemies in its path. Additionally, the spirit wolf howls, increasing your damage by 10% for 6 seconds.

primary attack.Name: Lightning Core
primary attack.Base Effect: Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning

primary attack.Name: Spiteful Blood
primary attack.Base Effect: Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Spiteful Blood to surge through you for 4 seconds, increasing your damage done by 30% and making you invulnerable to Primary Attacks from other players. Additionally, when Spiteful Blood triggers, you gain an absorb shield equal to 160% of your base damage. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds.
primary attack.Rank 10 Effect: Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Spiteful Blood to surge, increasing your damage by 40% for 6 seconds and making you invulnerable to damage. Additionally, you gain an absorb shield equal to 200% of your base damage while the effect is active.

primary attack.Name: Gloom Cask
primary attack.Base Effect: Primary Attack unleashes Aspect of Gloom for 6s, triggering gloom blades dealing 30% base damage + 275
primary attack.Rank 10 Effect: Your Primary Attacks unleash an Aspect of Gloom that lasts 10 seconds, during which your Primary Attacks deal 60% additional AoE damage.

attack.Name: Ca'arsen's Invigoration
attack.Base Effect: Primary Attack speed increased by 5.50%
attack.Rank 10 Effect: Increases the speed of your Primary Attack by 16% and the damage of your Primary Attack by 2%.

attack.Name: Cutthroat's Grin
attack.Base Effect: Gain 8.00% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind

attack.Name: Kir Sling
attack.Base Effect: 15% chance when attacked to release burst of light that Blinds enemies for 1.30 seconds
attack.Rank 10 Effect: You have a 25% chance when attacked to release a burst of light that Blinds all nearby enemies, reducing their vision and causing total loss of control for 3 seconds. Additionally, you deal 6% increased damage to Blinded enemies.

summon.Rank 10 Effect: Increases all damage you deal by 3% for each summon you control, up to a maximum increase of 18%. Additionally, your summons take 6% reduced damage.

shield.Base Effect: Prevents fatal damage and grants shield absorbing 450% base damage
shield.Rank 10 Effect: Prevents fatal damage and grants a shield absorbing 800% base damage for 10 seconds. Additionally, while the shield is active, your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.

channeled.Rank 10 Effect: Your Channeled skills consume energy 16% slower. Additionally, you take 2% reduced damage while using a Channeled skill.

dash.Name: Concentrated Will
dash.Base Effect: Dash skill calls guardian angel, deals 55% base damage + 547
dash.Rank 10 Effect: Using a Dash skill summons a guardian angel to your aid, dealing 120% base damage to all enemies in its path. Additionally, your Dash skills have their cooldowns reduced by 2 seconds.
